name: Beladaci Consulting
tag_list: social-media, community, saas, application, development, engineering, marketing, multiscreen
overview:
Synopsis

SocialPod™ is a cool app that brings more flexibility and insight to social networks and social media power users from celebrities to publishers and marketers to social space addicts.

Company

For the past eleven years I have been providing engineering and consulting serviced as a technical architect and software engineer specialized in rich immersive and interactive experiences with a focus on social media, multimedia and data visualization apps with clients ranging from entertainment and tech industries multinationals Walt Disney, Adobe and VMware to some of the most innovative and game changing startups in the social and media space including Digisynd, theAudience and Adap.tv.

On June of this year 2013 I finally made the decision to retire from consulting and to fully dedicate my time and effort on building the coolest killer social app ever.

Description

SocialPod makes it easier for celebrities, publishers, marketers and power users to track the real-time content, conversations and interaction they care about. It brings more flexibility and insight to power users through a customizable layout that lets you keep up with the people, content and topics that matter most to you.

Think of TweetDeck on steroids integrated with virtually any social and media network, platform or service: imagine synchronizing your tweets, status updates, notes and pages between Twitter, Facebook and Google+. Imagine finding all your friends across social networks in one place. Now extend that to chat, videos, pictures, music, events, pages, causes then add MySpace, Youtube, Vimeo, Flickr, LinkedIn and finish with some hardware accelerated graphics and video, best in class data visualization, beautiful interactive digital experience, flawless immersive interface and you’ve got the best social and multimedia experience on which SocialPod is being based.

Mission

Revolutionizing the way the world discovers, consumes and creates social media, content and interactions.

Products

SocialPod™ Web SocialPod™ Desktop SocialPod™ iOS® SocialPod™ Android® SocialPod™ Playbook® SocialPod™ WebOS® SocialPod™ TV

Powered by Adobe Flash® Platform. Web and desktop version compatible with PC, Mac and Linux. Mobile version will be available on Android, iOS and BlackBerry. Television version will be available for GoogleTV and the full range of Samsung Smart TV line.
